-e ---

𒄞 ≈ 𒋰𒆕 ≈ 𒋰𒁹𒑊 ≈ 𒋰𒄭 ≈ 𒋰𒎗 ≈ 𒄠

𒄞 𒄠 ≈ 𒃾 𒃿
𒄞 𒋫 ≈ 𒁉 𒋆
𒄞 ≈ 𒂁 𒃶 ≠ 𒄸 ḪUB₂
𒄞 GU4 ga@Kurd گو geow güe cow โค koo Kuh 𓃾 אָקס ёгюз ögüz ox
𒄞 GUD = 𒄑 GIŠ + 𒆕 DU ⇔ 𒂁 DUG djug Dich 𓎡 90°
𒄞 GUD ⇔ cod 𒄞𒄩 GU₄ku₆ carp #eštub #arsuppu
𒄞 GUD ⋍ cattle 𒄑 C + 𒆕 DEL ᎦᏓᎵ gadali 𒉌 genious!
𒄞 GUD ⋍ kettle 𒄠 ⇔ 𓎼 𓎡 ?
𒄞 GUD ⋍ goat, kid 𒇇 •Lämmer "ewe; sheep"
𒄞 GUD ⋍ good property
𒄞 GUD ⋍ үгеҙ ügeð ox
𒄞 GUD ⋍ 𒂵 GA calf, galac (cow milk)
𒄞 GUD ⋍ 𒃾 ĜEŠTIN
𒄞 GUD ⋍ gendus 公牛 gōngniú "ox"
𒄞 GUD < говедо govedo in 𒀖𒄞𒄭𒀀 cattle
𒄞 alpu α 𒀖 ÁB Α alpha bull 𓐑𓊪𓃒 ‘Apis’ Alp Vieh
𒄞 ≈ 𒄠 AM 𒀫 AMar 𒄠 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 •AMAᵘⁿ 𓃒 𓃓 būru bull

𒄞𒁕𒊑𒀀 gud-da-ri-a gudaria гуртовщи́к gurtovščík "drover"

𒌌 UL/DU

𒄐 biz2 PÀD 𒅆𒊒 paddle,rudder

𒄞𒁹 ≈ 𒋫 taur 𒋖 𓃒 𒋆

𒌚𒄞 Āru “Blossoming” Ayyār أَيَّار Iyar אִיָּיר month ≈ February

𒄞 ≈ 𒑙 in 𒄐 ≈ 𒑙𒄑

𒄞 GUD ⇔ CUP 𒄑𒁉
𒄞 GUD ⇔ 𒂁 DUG jug

𒄠 AM ⇔ amar.duk 𒀫𒌓 Marduk 𒃶
𒄠 GUD×KUR Kurd : wild ox, rîmu⋍ram?
𒄟 GUD×A + KUR
𒄐 GISAL 𒄞𒄑 GIŠ+UL (𒌌 UL)
𒄡 GUD / GUD LUGAL
𒇆 LAGAB×GUD
𒇇 LAGAB×GUD+GUD 𒇇 lahar Akk. lahru •Lämmer "ewe; sheep"
𒉖 NINDA2×GUD
𒉱 NUNUZ AB2×GUD
𒋵 TAG×GUD Taur?
𒍌 URU×U + GUD
𒍷 EZEN×GUD
𒎁 KA×GUD

𒀖 A'fish 𒀊𒄩 cod vs cattle 𒄞 gud

𒋭 ţābu 𒋫𒁍 ṭabu top / good ⇔ 𒄞 GUD

  1. month 𒌚 𒄞 Āru “Blossoming” Ayyār أَيَّار Iyar אִיָּיר

ĝisal 𒄞𒄑 ≈ 𒁉𒄑 BI.GIŠ / GIŠ.GUD
ĝisal 𒄞𒄑 "oar, rudder" 𒄀𒊓𒀠 gi-sa-al 𒄀𒊭𒀠𒈝 gi-ša-al-lum gišallu 𒈬𒊭𒈝 mu-ša-lum ⇔ sail

𒄞 bahar "potter"! BAḪAR₂ 𒁃 ≈ 𒂔 BAḪAR₂ potter 𒁇𒂔 baḫar₃ 𒌋𒂔 baḫar₄ "potter" po'er (British)
